metadata.name: Osmia
metadata.desc: Osmia is a set of tools for analysis of OpenStreetMap data, and publication of OpenStreetMap-compatible third-party data, for the purpose of quality control and enhancement of the OpenStreetMap database.
metadata.source: The data is derived from OpenStreetMap database, retrieved by Nominatim API and Overpass API. Additionally, a dataset "Generalised Land Use 2022 (shp)" from Department for Trade and Investment (South Australia) was used; Landing page. All data is licensed under Open Database Licence.
metadata.keywords: OpenStreetMap, Overpass, Nominatim, Openlayers, South Australia, metadata query
